update sys_user_base set user_role = #{userRole,jdbcType=TINYINT}, register_source = #{registerSource,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_bind_time = #{mobileBindTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_bind_time = #{emailBindTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, face = #{face,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, face200 = #{face200,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srcface = #{srcface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, push_token = #{pushToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, wchat_id = #{wchatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wchat_qrcode = #{wchatQrcode,jdbcType=BIGINT} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select base.*, qrcode.full_path as qrcode_path, qrcode.storage_name as qrcode_name from sys_user_base base left join sys_role_user sru on sru.user_id = base.uid inner join sys_role sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.type = 2 left join storage_image qrcode on qrcode.uid = base.wchat_qrcode
1=1 AND real_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition.realName},'%')
AND user_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition.userName},'%')
order by base.create_time ${orderField}

select base.*, qrcode.full_path as qrcode_path, qrcode.storage_name as qrcode_name from sys_user_base base left join sys_role_user sru on sru.user_id = base.uid inner join sys_role sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.type = 2 left join storage_image qrcode on qrcode.uid = base.wchat_qrcode
